synthesis_conditions.washing_method: washed with water (20 mL) then with ethanol (2 x 20 mL)
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: All structural and magnetic measurements were performed with care taken to prevent ethanol desorption prior to or during the measurement.

chemicals_used.name: Fe(ClO4)2·9H2O and Ni(ClO4)2·6H2O
chemicals_used.amount: x : (1 − x) molar ratios, such that x = 0.30, 0.50, 0.70, 0.80 and 0.90

chemicals_used.name: 1,2-bis(4'-pyridyl)acetylene (bpac)
chemicals_used.amount: corresponding to Fe and Ni amounts

chemicals_used.name: KAu(CN)2
chemicals_used.amount: double the molar amount of Fe and Ni combined

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: washed with water (20 mL) then with ethanol (2 x 20 mL)
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Ni dilution quantity was analysed by energy dispersive X-ray spectroscopy.
